short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NewTab removes the new tab site and replaces it with a new background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate way to add some color and excitement to your browsing experience! Our new Google Chrome extension automatically changes the background when you open a new tab.


*By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the NewTab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Policy policy

*Please review our Privacy Policy for details regarding the information we collect when you install and use the extension.
 
For more information please check:

Terms of Service:
https://newtab.org/terms/

Privacy Policy:
https://newtab.org/privacy/
